summary: This document contains the results of due diligence research conducted on the 2007 Jeffrey E. Epstein Insurance Trust #3. The research found no significant negative media or legal alerts associated with the trust, indicating a clean record in the databases searched. The document emphasizes the importance of compliance and thorough review in financial dealings involving politically exposed persons (PEPs).

keyFacts: The document reports no negative media or legal alerts found for the 2007 Jeffrey E. Epstein Insurance Trust #3.
The due diligence research was performed in accordance with AML Compliance standards.
The document emphasizes the need for escalation to senior management for accounts involving politically exposed persons (PEPs).
No court cases or public records were found related to the trust.
The document is marked confidential and is intended for internal use only.
